title: Harvey's "What if..." thread!
content:
I have some what if for you to answer!!

1. What if you had one eye?
2. What if you had 60 siblings?
3. What if you met a martian?
4. What if you could fly?
5. What if you could swim through the ground?
6. What if you were one inch tall?
7. What if you met a talking potato?
8. What if everything was blocky?
9. What if there were only 6 colors?
10. What if you had blue skin?
11. What if we all thought the same?
12. What if you could walk on ceilings and walls?
13. What if you spoke "dog?"
14. What if you could wear food and eat your clothes?
15. What if you could jump 50 miles high?

And that's it. Sorry if any of these have been asked before...Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
Tough guys have no table manners![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]

title: Re: Harvey's "What if..." thread!
content: What if you could STFU..? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-offended.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Harvey's "What if..." thread!
content:
Harvey, these have obviously been asked before.
